question: Which of the following statement is correct about the Tinkathia system?
option1: Cultivation of Indigo on the 3/20 area of land.
option2: Cultivation of Indigo on the 3/19 area of land.
option3: Cultivation of Indigo on the 3/18 area of land.
option4: Cultivation of Indigo on the 3/17 area of land.
answer: Cultivation of Indigo on the 3/20 area of land.
explanation: Raj Kumar Shukla requested Mahatma Gandhi to look into the problems of the indigo planters of Champaran in Bihar. The European planters had been forcing the peasants to grow indigo on 3/20 of the total land called the Tinkathia system.
